SamPy.astronomy.conversions.janskyToMagnitude¶

SamPy.astronomy.conversions.janskyToMagnitude(jansky)¶

Converts Janskys to AB magnitudes.

Note :

Can be used with SQLite3 database.
Parameters:
  • jansky (float or ndarray) – janskys of the object
Returns:

either a float or NumPy array
